scripts.archive: mkdir -p bundle && rm -rf bundle/* && dir-archiver --src . --dest ./bundle/hfh-pressbooks-theme.zip --exclude bundle .DS_Store .git .gitattributes .github .gitignore node_modules package-lock.json package.json pnpm-lock.yaml vite.config.js .npmrc
scripts.bundle: pnpm run build && pnpm run archive
